metadata.title: CVE-2018-14352 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Mutt before 1.10.1 and NeoMutt before2018-07-16. imap_quote_string in imap/util.c does not leave room for quotecharacters, leading to a stack-based buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14352` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

neomutt - 20180716+dfsg.1-1.2
No subscription required

mutt - 1.10.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: neomutt package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180716+dfsg.1-1.2').
mutt package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10.1-1').
